This is the official course website for AI-Agenter-F2026. Here you will find all the necessary information and materials for the course.

## Course Overview

This course provides an introduction to the exciting world of AI agents. We will explore the fundamental concepts, algorithms, and techniques used to build intelligent agents that can perceive their environment, make decisions, and take actions to achieve their goals.
